name: Royal Brew - Spring 2019
description:
Game Summary

W, A, S, D, - Move

Mouse – Look Around!

E – Teleport through the magical Green/Blue Portals

Get out your baking sheets and get ready to gather some ingredients!!  The royal wedding is tomorrow and you are tasked to conjure up a cake fitting for a Queen. Explore this lil witch's magical abode, find the matching ingredients, and brew up a simply fabulous cake!

Big thanks to Jordan Hughes for additional concept art! And Professor Keegan for helping make this game a reality

Sound Effects: Freesound.org

Music: Smile - Omnimusic

Artist Links

https://www.artstation.com/courtneyfayart

A game by Courtney Millman
